org.clafer.scope

Class ScopeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.clafer.scope.ScopeBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scopable

    public class ScopeBuilder
extends Object
implements Scopable
    Builder pattern for scopes. Use Scope.builder(), Scope.setScope(org.clafer.ast.AstClafer, int), Scope.defaultScope(int), Scope.intLow, or Scope.intHigh to construct the builder. The default scope and lowest and highest integers will be given a default if not set explicitly.
    Author:
    jimmy
    See Also:
    Scope

    • Method Detail

      • setScope

        public ScopeBuilder setScope(AstClafer clafer,
                    int scope)
        Set the scope of the Clafer. If the scope is already set for the Clafer, then the new scope overrides the previous one.
        Parameters:
        clafer - the Clafer
        scope - the scope of the clafer
        Returns:
        this builder

      • adjustScope

        public ScopeBuilder adjustScope(AstClafer clafer,
                       int adjust)
        Adjust the scope of the Clafer. If the Clafer already has a scope then newScope = oldScope + adjust. Otherwise newScope = defaultScope + adjust.
        Parameters:
        clafer - the Clafer
        adjust - increment the scope by this amount
        Returns:
        this builder

      • defaultScope

        public ScopeBuilder defaultScope(int defaultScope)
        Set the scope for unspecified Clafers. If the default scope is already set, then the new default scope overrides the previous one.
        Parameters:
        defaultScope - the default scope
        Returns:
        this builder

      • adjustDefaultScope

        public ScopeBuilder adjustDefaultScope(int adjust)
        Adjust the scope of unspecified Clafers.
        Parameters:
        adjust - increment the default scope by this amount
        Returns:
        this builder

      • intLow

        public ScopeBuilder intLow(int intLow)
        Set the lowest (inclusive) integer used for solving. If the lowest integer is already set, then the new lowest integer overrides the previous one.
        Parameters:
        intLow - the lowest integer
        Returns:
        this builder

      • adjustIntLow

        public ScopeBuilder adjustIntLow(int adjust)
        Adjust the lowest integer used for solving.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this builder

      • intHigh

        public ScopeBuilder intHigh(int intHigh)
        Set the highest (inclusive) integer used for solving. If the highest integer is already set, then the new highest integer overrides the previous one.
        Parameters:
        intHigh - the highest integer
        Returns:
        this builder

        public ScopeBuilder adjustIntHigh(int adjust)

        Parameters:
        adjust - increment the highest integer by this amount
        Returns:
        this builder

      • toScope

        public Scope toScope()
        Finalizes all the decisions made in the builder. Further changes to this builder is permitted for building more scopes, but the returned scope will not be affected.
        Specified by:
        toScope in interface Scopable
        Returns:
        the built scope
